talk.author: did:plc:3c4khdguufb6bkzg6yyo24mo
talk.utter: I hope Rob, that you aren’t bothered by sex workers being here, but more likely when an account with three scant photos and a link to a telegram channel decides to blanked thousands of people with an unwanted follow. It’s a big issue on insta, and that’s what we don’t want here.

talk.author: did:plc:x5mfuycii53jufk7o3f3k7xp
talk.utter: No, agreed, that’s totally annoying besides maybe also a scam or malware vector. You can kinda tell when all the posts are from the last day and they somehow follow 5k people already. Or when 5 accounts with the same profile pic and copypasta bio follow you at once. I report and block those.

talk.author: did:plc:3c4khdguufb6bkzg6yyo24mo
talk.utter: Exactly. I understand sex workers have limited resources to get work, or views, so it’s tough finding a place, but as long as they are minding their business and not spamming folks who aren’t looking, it’s not a problem.
